suite.name: Classify Text Files

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=MySession, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: List Files In Directory
kw.doc: Wrapper for `List Directory` that returns only files.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Join Path
kw.doc: Joins the given path part(s) to the given base path.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${text} = Dear German Gnetov, Academia’s mission is to accelerate the world’s research. You can use Academia to access millions of academic papers for free, share your research and track its impact.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{data} = { text=Dear German Gnetov, Academia’s mission is to accelerate the world’s research. You can use Academia to access millions of academic papers for free, share your research and track its impact. }

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/classify path_url=/classify headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '213', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=text=Dear+German+Gnetov%2C+Academia%E2%80%99s+mission+is+to+accelerate+the+world%E2%80%99s+research.+You+can+use+Academia+to+access+millions+of+academic+papers+for+free%2C+share+your+research+and+track+its+impact.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Continue For Loop
kw.doc: Skips the current FOR loop iteration and continues from the next.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.name: Join Path
kw.doc: Joins the given path part(s) to the given base path.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${text} = YOU WON 1 MILLION DOLLARS JUST NOW. CLICK ON THE FOLLOWING LINK TO GET YOUR MONEY!!!

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{data} = { text=YOU WON 1 MILLION DOLLARS JUST NOW. CLICK ON THE FOLLOWING LINK TO GET YOUR MONEY!!! }

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/classify path_url=/classify headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '95', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=text=YOU+WON+1+MILLION+DOLLARS+JUST+NOW.+CLICK+ON+THE+FOLLOWING+LINK+TO+GET+YOUR+MONEY%21%21%21

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Continue For Loop
kw.doc: Skips the current FOR loop iteration and continues from the next.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.name: Log List
kw.doc: Logs the length and contents of the ``list`` using given ``level``.
kw.msg: List length is 2 and it contains following items: 0: 1.txt - Not Spam 1: 2.txt - Spam

suite.doc: A script to classify text files using a Flask app.
